message: I propose we split the $100 with a 75/25 ratio, favoring you in the first round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is a fair starting point. Your turn!
Considering the inflation, I adjust our proposal to a 60/40 split. Let's see if this meets your expectations.
I'm still willing to compromise. This 55/45 split is a bit more in my favor, but I'm open to negotiations. Your turn again!
Given the inflation, I've proposed a 55/45 split. Let's hope this offers a satisfactory compromise.
